trans-unit.source: Attention! Production credentials do not work on the test environment or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Attention! Production credentials do not work on the test environment or vice versa.

trans-unit.source: Access credentials are username and password pairs provided by Banca Transilvania when the merchant is created on the iPay platform. These are necessary for accessing the iPay console and for calling the APIs.
trans-unit.target: Access credentials are username and password pairs provided by Banca Transilvania when the merchant is created on the iPay platform. These are necessary for accessing the iPay console and for calling the APIs.

trans-unit.source: Online transactions through BT iPay using AMEX cards are not supported, however, we accept payments with Revolut.
trans-unit.target: Online transactions through BT iPay using AMEX cards are not supported, however, we accept payments with Revolut.

trans-unit.source: Full internationalization support for English and Romanian, with easily translatable module texts for additional languages.
trans-unit.target: Full internationalization support for English and Romanian, with easily translatable module texts for additional languages.

trans-unit.source: Automatic invoice generation upon successful payment, customizable per merchant preference.
trans-unit.target: Automatic invoice generation upon successful payment, customizable per merchant preference.

trans-unit.source: Card on File functionality to streamline future transactions.
trans-unit.target: Card on File functionality to streamline future transactions.

trans-unit.source: Multi-currency support with comprehensive logging features for easier troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: Multi-currency support with comprehensive logging features for easier troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: Flexible configuration options with easy toggle between test and live modes.
trans-unit.target: Flexible configuration options with easy toggle between test and live modes.

trans-unit.source: Benefits of using BT iPay payment module
trans-unit.target: Benefits of using BT iPay payment module

trans-unit.source: Developed by Arnia Software Romania and backed by Banca Transilvania’s robust online payment solution, this module is designed to streamline your online payment process, offering a secure and efficient transaction experience for both merchants and customers.
trans-unit.target: Developed by Arnia Software Romania and backed by Banca Transilvania’s robust online payment solution, this module is designed to streamline your online payment process, offering a secure and efficient transaction experience for both merchants and customers.

trans-unit.source: Our module supports all transaction types, ensuring secure and efficient payment processing.
trans-unit.target: Our module supports all transaction types, ensuring secure and efficient payment processing.

trans-unit.source: Effortlessly manage payments with BT iPay’s user-friendly interface.
trans-unit.target: Effortlessly manage payments with BT iPay’s user-friendly interface.
